Detailed Description

LightDialog class is the dialog to define the light parameters.

LightDialog sets light parameters. The parameters that user can define are light suunshape, light input aperture shape and light position.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

LightDialog::LightDialog ( TLightKit *  currentLightKit,
QVector< TShapeFactory * >  shapeFactoryList,
QVector< TSunShapeFactory * >  sunshapeFactoryList,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new dialog for the light definition.

The dialog present a list given by sunshapeFactoryList to define light sunshape, shapeFactoryList for the light input aperture and shows the the light parameters defined in the light currentLightKit.

Destroys the LightDialog object.
